bibliography:
Anderson, Elizabeth (1993). Value in Ethics and Economics.
Cambridge, Mass: Harvard University Press.

Oxford University Press.

Blackburn, Simon (1998). Ruling Passions. Oxford: Clarendon
Press.

Brandt, Richard (1946). “Moral Valuation.”
Ethics 56: 106–21.

Brentano, Franz (1969) [1889]. The Origin of our Knowledge of

Kegan Paul.

Bykvist, Krister (2009). “No Good Fit: Why the Fitting
Attitude Analysis of Value Fails.”  Mind 118(469):
1–30.

Chisholm, Roderick (1986). Brentano and Intrinsic Value.
Cambridge: Cambridge University Press.

Crisp, Roger (2000). “Review of Jon Kupperman, Value…and

Danielsson, Sven and Jonas Olson (2007). “Brentano and the
Buck-Passers.” Mind 116: 511-522.

Darwall, Stephen (2006). The Second-Person Standpoint: Morality,

Press.

“Toward Fin de siècle Ethics: Some Trends.”
